titles.title: I Will Turn Their Mourning Into Joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will turn their mourning into joy.
And I will surely comfort them.
And I will cause them to rejoice,
Forever more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Weeping may endure yet for the night,
But surely joy comes in the morn.
Just as surely as the dawn,
The dawning of a brand new day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tornare su lamento en recocijo
Consolare en su dolor.
Y causare que para siempre se regocigen.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lagrimas caeran por la noche.
Pero en la manana goso habra.
Tan cierto como el amanecer.
Como se levanta el sol.
